attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Privatisation is quietly creeping into every corner of a national health system which is respected and admired worldwide. We ask you the government, to work to uphold the free and inclusive nature of the NHS and prevent further privatisation.

rejection.details: Please redraft without the capitals, as they make it hard for people to read
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
